thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Marrying Technology and Financial Advice to Serve a Variety of Investors

author: wsjcom
title: Marrying Technology and Financial Advice to Serve a Variety of Investors
text:
Alex Benke • Vice president of advice and investing, Betterment, New York • Education: BS Cornell University • Professional designation: Certified Financial Planner
Background: “I never expected to be an adviser,” says Mr. Benke, who started his career as a software engineer for JPMorgan Chase. But his father was a financial planner at the time, and a one-year stint at his wealth-management office made Mr. Benke appreciate the value financial planning offers clients. Now he combines both interests at Betterment, drawing...
